review_title: Areas of capacity and skills building
job_title: Co State Coordinator in Perth, Western Australia
pros: Project planning, implementation, evaluation, campaigning, management
cons: Office space, team building, offive equipments

pros: Amazing cause fighting for women's rights, incredible team
cons: Burnout and too much of a top-down approach

pros: Lovely coworkers, very compassionate and understanding. Always supporting one another.
Team building exercises, on the job training, seemed like a good cause, diverse group of employees
cons: Not very good pay, commission based, felt like they kind of threw you to the sharks, and after the initial training there was little assistance, which would have been fine if it wasn't accompanied by the fact that failure to make a sale in the first couple of days would result in being let go.
